Content.Text:
<NAME_UNKOWN><MYNAME>, <MYNAME>. This is terrible! You
need to <RED>help that person on the ground</RED>!

<NAME_UNKOWN>Don't worry about who I am! Quickly,
help him!

<RED>Echo Village</RED>.
<PAGE>
This settlement, surrounded by
mountains, was once home to many people
and full of life.
<PAGE>
However, that golden age is but a
memory...
<PAGE>
This town is now the destination of a
capable youngster, who brings with them
a heart full of excited determination.
